name: NSBezierPath.ElementType
desc: Constants that specify basic path element commands.

items.name: case moveTo
items.desc: Moves the path objectâ€™s current drawing point to the specified point.

items.name: case lineTo
items.desc: Creates a straight line from the current drawing point to the specified point.

items.name: case curveTo
items.desc: Creates a curved line segment from the current point to the specified endpoint using two control points to define the curve.

items.name: case closePath
items.desc: Marks the end of the current subpath at the specified point.
